languages.text: {n}Разнообразие местной флоры порой поражает воображение. Среди заросших плющами и мхами деревьев виднеются маленькие белые комки, налипшие по спирали на один из стволов. Кто-то надрезал кору, и млечный сок натек на поврежденные участки, застыв от жары упругими неровными коконами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Разнообразие местной флоры порой поражает воображение. Среди заросших плющами и мхами деревьев виднеются маленькие белые комки, налипшие по спирали на один из стволов. Кто-то надрезал кору, и млечный сок натек на поврежденные участки, застыв от жары упругими неровными коконами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The rich flora of the forest at times staggers the imagination. Among the trees covered in ivy and moss, the Rogue Trader notices a spiralling pattern of small white lumps on one of the tree trunks. Someone has cut the bark, causing the milky sap to flow down the damaged parts of the tree, harden from the heat, and turn into uneven rubbery cocoons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Разнообразие местной флоры порой поражает воображение. Среди заросших плющами и мхами деревьев виднеются маленькие белые комки, налипшие по спирали на один из стволов. Кто-то надрезал кору, и млечный сок натек на поврежденные участки, застыв от жары упругими неровными коконами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The rich flora of the forest is mind-boggling at times. Among the trees covered with ivy and moss, small white lumps can be seen, covering one of the tree trunks in a spiralling pattern. Someone had cut the bark, letting the milky sap to flow out and harden from the heat, covering the damaged parts with uneven elastic white cocoons.{/n}

{n}The rich flora of the forest is mind-boggling at times. Among the trees covered with ivy and moss, small white lumps can be seen, covering one of the tree trunks in a spiralling pattern. Someone had cut the bark, letting the milky sap to flow out and harden from the heat, covering the damaged parts with uneven elastic white cocoons.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La abundante flora del bosque va más allá de lo imaginable. Entre árboles cubiertos de musgo y enredaderas, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente nota una espiral de pequeños bultos blancos en uno de los troncos. Alguien ha cortado la corteza para que fluya la lechosa savia. Al bajar por las partes dañadas del árbol y endurecerse por el calor, forma crisálidas gomosas irregulares.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rich flora of the forest at times staggers the imagination. Among the trees covered in ivy and moss, the Rogue Trader notices a spiralling pattern of small white lumps on one of the tree trunks. Someone has cut the bark, causing the milky sap to flow down the damaged parts of the tree, harden from the heat, and turn into uneven rubbery cocoons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La abundante vegetación del bosque presenta una variedad pasmosa. Entre los árboles cubiertos de musgo y enredaderas pueden verse pequeños bultos blancos que forman una espiral alrededor del tronco. Alguien abrió una brecha en la corteza, y del tajo manó una savia lechosa que se endureció al calor y cubrió las partes dañadas con una especie de capullos elásticos blanquecinos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}森林中的植物群有时丰富得令人难以置信。在爬满常春藤和苔藓的树上，行商浪人注意到许多白色的小块以螺旋状的图案覆在某棵树的树干上。有人砍开了树皮，乳白色的树液流了出来，在高温之下变硬，凝固在受损的树枝上，看起来像是充满弹性、不均匀的白茧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rich flora of the forest at times staggers the imagination. Among the trees covered in ivy and moss, the Rogue Trader notices a spiralling pattern of small white lumps on one of the tree trunks. Someone has cut the bark, causing the milky sap to flow down the damaged parts of the tree, harden from the heat, and turn into uneven rubbery cocoons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}森林中的植物群有时丰富得令人难以置信。在爬满常春藤和苔藓的树上，可以看到白色的小块，以螺旋状的图案覆盖在一棵树干上。有人砍断了树皮，乳白色的树液流了出来，在高温之下变硬，凝固在受损的树枝上，看起来像是充满弹性、不均匀的白茧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La flore bigarrée de la forêt défie parfois l'imagination. Parmi les arbres recouverts de mousse et de lierre, on peut voir de petites protubérances blanches qui forment un motif en spirale sur un tronc. Quelqu'un a tranché l'écorce et la sève laiteuse qui s'en est écoulée a durci à la chaleur, couvrant les parties endommagées de cocons blancs irréguliers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rich flora of the forest at times staggers the imagination. Among the trees covered in ivy and moss, the Rogue Trader notices a spiralling pattern of small white lumps on one of the tree trunks. Someone has cut the bark, causing the milky sap to flow down the damaged parts of the tree, harden from the heat, and turn into uneven rubbery cocoons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La flore bigarrée de la forêt défie parfois l'imagination. Parmi les arbres recouverts de mousse et de lierre, on peut voir de petites protubérances blanches qui forment un motif en spirale sur un tronc. Quelqu'un a tranché l'écorce et la sève laiteuse qui s'en est écoulée a durci à la chaleur, couvrant les parties endommagées de cocons blancs irréguliers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}森の豊かな植物相には、ときに想像力をかきたてるものだ。ツタやコケに覆われた木々の中に、小さな白い塊が幹を螺旋状に覆っているのが見える。何者かが樹皮を切り、乳白色の樹液を流出させたあとに熱で固め、傷んだ部分を不揃いな弾力のある白い繭に変えたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rich flora of the forest at times staggers the imagination. Among the trees covered in ivy and moss, the Rogue Trader notices a spiralling pattern of small white lumps on one of the tree trunks. Someone has cut the bark, causing the milky sap to flow down the damaged parts of the tree, harden from the heat, and turn into uneven rubbery cocoons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}森の豊かな植物相には、ときに想像力をかきたてるものだ。ツタやコケに覆われた木々の中に、小さな白い塊が幹を螺旋状に覆っているのが見える。何者かが樹皮を切り、乳白色の樹液を流出させたあとに熱で固め、傷んだ部分を不揃いな弾力のある白い繭に変えたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die reiche Flora des Waldes sprengt mitunter jede Vorstellungskraft. Zwischen den mit Efeu und Moos bewachsenen Bäumen bemerkt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kleine weiße Flecken, die einen der Stämme in einem spiralförmigen Muster bedecken. Jemand hat die Rinde entfernt, und nun fließt milchiges Harz die verletzten Teile des Baums entlang, das – von der Hitze gehärtet – ungleichmäßige, gummiartige Kokons bildet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rich flora of the forest at times staggers the imagination. Among the trees covered in ivy and moss, the Rogue Trader notices a spiralling pattern of small white lumps on one of the tree trunks. Someone has cut the bark, causing the milky sap to flow down the damaged parts of the tree, harden from the heat, and turn into uneven rubbery cocoons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die reiche Flora des Waldes ist manchmal schlicht umwerfend. Zwischen den mit Efeu und Moos bewachsenen Bäumen sind kleine weiße Flecken zu sehen, die einen der Baumstämme in einem Spiralmuster bedecken. Jemand hat die Rinde aufgeschnitten, so dass der milchige Saft hinausgeflossen und durch die Hitze hart geworden ist. Die beschädigten Teile des Baumes wurden so durch ungleichmäßige, elastische weiße Kokons bedeckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ormanın zengin florası, ara sıra hayal gücünün sınırlarını zorluyor. Sarmaşık ve yosunla kaplı ağaçların arasındaki Hür Tacir, ağaç gövdelerinin birinde ufak beyaz öbeklerden oluşan spiral bir desen fark ediyor. Birisi bu ağacı keserek süt kıvamındaki öz suyun ağacın kesilen yerlerinden akıp sıcaktan sertleşmesine ve lastiği andıran farklı boyutlardaki kozalara dönüşmesine neden olmuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rich flora of the forest at times staggers the imagination. Among the trees covered in ivy and moss, the Rogue Trader notices a spiralling pattern of small white lumps on one of the tree trunks. Someone has cut the bark, causing the milky sap to flow down the damaged parts of the tree, harden from the heat, and turn into uneven rubbery cocoons.{/n}
